job.title: Quality Assurance Analyst
job.description: Need to participate in the following activities: 1. Requirement Gathering and Analysis: Analyse functional/non-functional requirements and seek clarifications for better understanding of requirements Define timeline estimates based on the requirements 2. Design: Preparation of technical specification document and review the same 3. Coding: Follow coding standards and best practices to check code quality Conduct technical troubleshooting 4. Testing: Perform Unit testing and coordinate with QA team during the testing phase 5. Knowledge Management: Create specific artifacts for tasks allocated by supervisor Apply best practices/ learning during development activities." 6. Spanish fluency is the requirement with the ability to follow phone flows alongside an English-speaking QA tester.
